channel.title: Project Perfection V3 | Strictly Unique | Final Version |
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vio64g.png[/img]
[img]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/RSPerfectionOfficial?feature=mhee] Official Youtube[/url]
Developers:
Server: C++ Imbued
Client: C++ Imbued
What will make this perfect?: This project will have many unique features, It will be an Economic server the experience rates will be perfected, All content that is added it will be added knowing it will perform at it's best.
[font=comic sans ms][size=12pt]Features Clientside:[/size][/font]
[ul][*]Fully Functional options [*]Perfect Hitmarks with fading [*]External Cache Packed 602 Animations & Gfx [*]External Cache Packed 508 Maps & Objects [*]External Cache Packed 634 Items [*]External Cache Packed 602 Npc's [*]External Cache Packed 633 Characters [*]Fully Functional Orbs [*]Fully Functional Summoning Maps[/ul]
[font=comic sans ms][size=12pt]Features Serverside:[/size][/font]
[ul][*]Clipped following using pathfinding [*]Combat Clipped Following [*]NPC Clipped Following [*]Fully functional Hand Cannon [*]Rewritten Herblore [*]Rewritten Mining [*]Rewritten Fishing [*]Rewritten Woodcutting [*]Rewritten Firemaking [*]Rewritten Agility (Not entirely Finished Only 1 Course Working) [*]Rewritten Smithing [*]Rewritten Prayer [*]Rewritten Cooking [*]Rewritten Crafting [*]Rewritten Fletching [*]Fully working Curse Prayers [*]Fully Working Normal Prayers [*]Fully Functional Quick Prayers & Quick Curses [*]Full 63 Wave Jad [*]Summoning [*]Familiar Specials [*]Fully Functional Pouch Creating With Interfaces [*]Curse Prayer Adjustments [*]All Known bugs since V1 And V2 Fixed [*]Perfect Ranged & Magic Formulas [*]Curse Protect Range/Mage/Melee Deflects [*]Fully Functional Overloads (Exact to runescape) [*]Perfect Inferno Adze & Formula[/ul]
[img]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/RSPerfectionOfficial?feature=mhee] Official Youtube[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img]Combat
Melee Magic Range
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] Prayer
All Bones on Altar Work All Bones can be buried Correct animations
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QusJe.gif[/img] Mining
All ores can be mined Ore running out + Refilling Prospecting Correct Animations
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] Smithing
All Ores can be smelted All Armor inside of interface are able to be made Correct Animations & Object used
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] Fishing
Correct item requirements Correct animations ALL Fish can be caught Animation resetting support Fishing spots across the map
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] Cooking
Correct Animations Many Fish can be cooked Correct burning formula
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] Woodcutting
Correct hatchet animations All trees cut able Stumps and regrowing trees
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] Firemaking
All logs light able Adding and depleting of lightened logs Correct animations Ashes appear after logs burn out Clipped
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] Agility
Fully working Gnome Agility Course
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] Herblore
Correct animations Herb Identifying Many potions can be made
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] Thieving
Thieving from NPC's Thieving From Stalls Correct animations
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] Crafting
Correct Animations Working Interfaces Cutting Gems Making Leather/Chaps Ect Tanning + Interface
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] Runecrafting
Working Multiple crafting All altars working Use of the Abyss Use of Pouches
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] Fletching
All logs can be fletched Creating Bows Creating Shafts All Correct Animations String Bows
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OomYz.gif[/img] Slayer
Standard PI Slayer For Now
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NYu86.gif[/img] Farming
Not Started
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20071125155039/runescape/images/c/cb/Miscellaneous_key.png[/img] Minigames
Duel Arena Full 63 Wave Jad Barrows Godwars Pest Control (Novice Boat, Intermediate Boat, Veteran Boat) Bounty Hunter Barbarian Assault
[youtube]http://youtu.be/s9iBprCy7sQ[/youtube] [youtube]http://youtu.be/dwLvO7YGPx0[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HWe_sjaSktw&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D2gnGq1UL6s&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
SUPPORT THIS PROJECT [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mt6s1e.png[/img]
- Credits - Wtf Ur Zerk 01053 Sanity Whoever else

item.title: Project Perfection V3 | Strictly Unique | Final Version |
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

Just rewrote Prayer Supports every single bone runescape has.

[CODE] /Starter Bones/
REGULAR(526, 5, “Bones”),
NORMAL2(2530, 5, “Bones”),
Burnt(529, 5, “Burnt Bones”),
BATB(530, 5, “Bat Bones”),
WOLFB(2859, 5, “Wolf Bones”),
MONKEYB0(3179, 5, “Monkey Bones”),
MONKEYB1(3180, 5, “Monkey Bones”),
MONKEYB2(3181, 5, “Monkey Bones”),
MONKEYB3(3182, 5, “Monkey Bones”),
MONKEYB4(3183, 5, “Monkey Bones”),
MONKEYB5(3185, 5, “Monkey Bones”),
MONKEYB6(3186, 5, “Monkey Bones”),
MONKEYB7(3187, 5, “Monkey Bones”),

	/*Decent Bones*/
	BBONE(532, 15, "Big Bones"),
	Jogre(3125, 20, "Jogre Bones"),
	BJogre(3127, 21, "Burnt Jogre Bones"),
	Zogre(4812, 21, "Zogre Bones"),
	Shaik(3123, 22, "Shaikahan Bones"),
	Baby(534, 30, "Baby Dragon Bones"),
	Wyvern(6812, 40, "Wyvern Bones"),
	Dragon(536, 72, "Dragon Bones"),
	Fayrg(4830, 74, "Fayrg Bones"),
	
	/*Good Bones*/
	OurgB(14793, 75, "Ourg Bones"),
	RaurgBone(4832, 75, "Raurg Bones"),
	OurgBone(4834, 85, "Ourg Bones"),
	DagBone(6729, 125, "Dagannoth Bones"),	
            ANCIENT(15410, 180, "Ancient Bones"),
	Frost(18830, 195, "Frost Bones");[/CODE]

Also done some cleaning up of the content that I rushed and was somewhat unclean.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Perfection V3 | Strictly Unique | Final Version |
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

[quote=“Skyru, post:37, topic:434601”][quote author=C++ Imbued link=topic=537318.msg3930660#msg3930660 date=1330645293]
Well after a little while of reading up on how all the sap prayers work I’ve started working on them

I have just about finished ‘Sap Warrior’.

[ IMG ]http://i43.tinypic.com/18nmz6.png[ /img ]

Sap Range/Mage are completed.
[/quote]
That’s really sexy. What are you working on now?[/quote]Well I finished Inferno adze with perfect formula earlier but couldn’t post because of the 1 per person crap ;(

Inferno Adze Project Perfection - YouTube

Inferno Adze

If your firemaking is below 92 the formula will not work however if your above 92 firemaking you will have a chance to burn the log first go.

[COLOR=red]From RSWiki[/COLOR]:

Interestingly enough it still works to chop wood and mine ores; however, any wood chopped using the adze before reaching level 92 firemaking does not have a chance to be immediately burnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Perfection V3 | Strictly Unique | Final Version |
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:32, topic:434601”][quote author=C++ Imbued link=topic=537318.msg3929677#msg3929677 date=1330558926]
Overloads done; Overloads - YouTube

Note: at that time it was only set to 3 server ticks when it’s suppose to be 5.

When a dose of overload potion is consumed, it will deal 100 points of damage per game tick for 5 game ticks (3 seconds), for a total of 500 damage. It will also boost Attack, Strength, Defence, Ranged, and Magic by the same amount that an extreme potion of that skill would boost. Attack, Strength, and Defence are boosted by 5+22% of level, Ranged is boosted by 4 to 23 levels, and Magic receives a boost of +7.

[/quote]like 80% proper (not including the tick problem )

-does it show equipped weapons when doing the animation?
-there should be a small gfx with it[/quote]The tick is fixed I changed it ^_^. and the GFX I can’t find :/. and the weapon going invisible is easy an easy fix.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

Overloads done; Overloads - YouTube

Note: at that time it was only set to 3 server ticks when it’s suppose to be 5.

When a dose of overload potion is consumed, it will deal 100 points of damage per game tick for 5 game ticks (3 seconds), for a total of 500 damage. It will also boost Attack, Strength, Defence, Ranged, and Magic by the same amount that an extreme potion of that skill would boost. Attack, Strength, and Defence are boosted by 5+22% of level, Ranged is boosted by 4 to 23 levels, and Magic receives a boost of +7.
